channel.title: Darknet – Hacking Tools, Hacker News & Cyber Security
channel.description: Darknet is your best source for the latest hacking tools, hacker news, cyber security best practices, ethical hacking & pen-testing.

image.title: Darknet – Hacking Tools, Hacker News & Cyber Security

item.title: Best EDR Of The Market (BEOTM) – Endpoint Detection and Response Testing Tool

description.#cdata-section: BestEDROfTheMarket is a naive user-mode EDR (Endpoint Detection and Response) tool designed to serve as a testing ground

item.title: AgentSmith HIDS – Host Based Intrusion Detection

description.#cdata-section: AgentSmith HIDS is a powerful component of a Host-based Intrusion Detection system, it has anti-rootkit functionalities and is a very performant way to collect information about a host.

item.title: padre – Padding Oracle Attack Exploiter Tool

description.#cdata-section: padre is an advanced exploiter and Padding Oracle attack tool that can be deployed against CBC mode encryption.

item.title: Privacy Implications of Web 3.0 and Darknets

description.#cdata-section: The evolution of the internet has been rapid over the years and has impacted the privacy implications of Web 3.0 and Darknets

item.title: DataSurgeon – Extract Sensitive Information (PII) From Logs

description.#cdata-section: DataSurgeon (ds) is a versatile tool designed to Extract Sensitive Information (PII) From Logs, it's intended to be used for incident response, penetration testing, and CTF challenges.

item.title: Pwnagotchi – Maximize Crackable WPA Key Material For Bettercap

description.#cdata-section: Pwnagotchi is an A2C-based "AI" leveraging bettercap that learns from its surrounding WiFi environment to maximize crackable WPA key material it captures

item.title: HardCIDR – Network CIDR and Range Discovery Tool

description.#cdata-section: HardCIDR is a Linux Bash script to discover the netblocks, or ranges, (in CIDR notation) owned by the target organization during the intelligence gathering phase of a penetration test.

item.title: Socialscan – Command-Line Tool To Check For Email And Social Media Username Usage

description.#cdata-section: socialscan is an accurate command-line tool to check For email and social media username usage on online platforms, given an email address or username, socialscan returns whether it is available, taken or invalid on online platforms. Other similar tools check username availability by requesting the profile page of the username in question and based on […]

item.title: CFRipper – CloudFormation Security Scanning & Audit Tool

description.#cdata-section: CFRipper is a Python-based Library and CLI security analyzer that functions as an AWS CloudFormation security scanning and audit tool, it aims to prevent vulnerabilities from getting to production infrastructure through vulnerable CloudFormation scripts. You can use CFRipper to prevent deploying insecure AWS resources into your Cloud environment. You can write your own compliance checks […]

item.title: CredNinja – Test Credential Validity of Dumped Credentials or Hashes

description.#cdata-section: CredNinja is a tool to quickly test credential validity of dumped credentials (or hashes) across an entire network or domain very efficiently. At the core of it, you provide it with a list of credentials you have dumped (or hashes, it can pass-the-hash) and a list of systems on the domain (the author suggests scanning […]
